meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent2: Oh, jimminy! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent3: Jimminy, I can't believe I missed the bus!
meanings.sent4: The loud thunder made me shout, 'Jimminy!'
meanings.sent5: When the magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat, I exclaimed, 'Jimminy!'

meanings.definition: A minced oath used to avoid saying 'Jesus' or 'God'.
meanings.sent1: She said 'jimminy' instead of the other word.
meanings.sent2: The old book used 'jimminy' as a replacement for a sacred name.
meanings.sent3: He chuckled at the child who innocently said 'jimminy'.
meanings.sent4: The actor in the play used 'jimminy' to stay in character.
meanings.sent5: The author cleverly included 'jimminy' in the dialogue to show the character's personality.
